products.title: Origin Deluxe, Champagne - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Origin deluxe, champagne - venetian blind champagne is one of the latest additions to their ever-popular origin deluxe range, and one that is sure to transform the way you think about combining style and substance in your home. The finely crafted slats work
products.productdescription: Champagne is one of the latest additions to their ever-popular origin deluxe range, and one that is sure to transform the way you think about combining style and substance in your home. The finely crafted slats work in perfect harmony with the gentle fizzle of the colouring and the assortment of accompanying fixtures to create a unique visual that is truly something to savour.

products.title: Origin Deluxe, Seashell White - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Origin deluxe, seashell white - venetian blind seashell white from the origin deluxe range is an artistic blend of smooth and gentle colour on the one hand, and beautifully crafted coordinating fixtures on the other. The subtle use of colour and the effor
products.productdescription: Seashell white from the origin deluxe range is an artistic blend of smooth and gentle colour on the one hand, and beautifully crafted coordinating fixtures on the other. The subtle use of colour and the effortlessly smooth texture evoke memories of relaxing down by the coast.

products.title: Origin Deluxe, City Grey - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Origin deluxe, city grey - venetian blind the origin deluxe range has created city grey to offer a contemporary reinterpretation of much-loved urban decor. The depth and striking finish of the steely grey work in perfect harmony with the gently crafted wo
products.productdescription: The origin deluxe range has created city grey to offer a contemporary reinterpretation of much-loved urban decor. The depth and striking finish of the steely grey work in perfect harmony with the gently crafted wooden slats and the assortment of unique complimentary fixtures and features.

products.title: Origin Deluxe, Warm Oak - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Origin deluxe, warm oak - venetian blind light yet, true to its name, warm, the origin deluxe's warm oak has a truly natural look to it, and the coated basswood, which is ecologically sourced, is durable and high quality. This luxury edition includes coor
products.productdescription: Light yet, true to its name, warm, the origin deluxe's warm oak has a truly natural look to it, and the coated basswood, which is ecologically sourced, is durable and high quality. This luxury edition includes coordinating ladder tapes that are used to hold and control the thick, substantial slats.Combine rustic style with contemporary chic by partnering the organic yet modern warm oak with natural slates and white painted wickers. Include a feature colour of gentle sage or muted sky blue to enhance the country style.

products.title: Origin Deluxe, Old Walnut - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Origin deluxe, old walnut - venetian blind a traditionally coloured blind, the origin deluxe in old walnut displays a dark-medium wood with a natural, matt finish. The wooden slats hang from a matching wooden pelmet and are backed with coordinating ladder
products.productdescription: A traditionally coloured blind, the origin deluxe in old walnut displays a dark-medium wood with a natural, matt finish. The wooden slats hang from a matching wooden pelmet and are backed with coordinating ladder tapes, so that there is no distraction from the beauty of this piece.Embrace the inherent class of the old walnut and group it with similarly traditional colours and furnishings. For a simple yet effective style in the living room, opt for cream walls and sofas, and wooden flooring and furniture. Provide plenty of cosy throws and cushions to complete this well-established look.

products.title: Origin Deluxe, Charcoal Grey - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Origin deluxe, charcoal grey - venetian blind charcoal grey from the origin deluxe range is the perfect combination of powerful colour and effortless finishing. By bringing the two together in perfect harmony, and adding a selection of easy on the eye fix
products.productdescription: Charcoal grey from the origin deluxe range is the perfect combination of powerful colour and effortless finishing. By bringing the two together in perfect harmony, and adding a selection of easy on the eye fixtures, it creates a striking visual that will set the tone for the rest of your decor.

products.title: Origin Deluxe, Solitaire - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Origin deluxe, solitaire - venetian blind the origin deluxe range has been expanded to included solitaire: a natural and gentle blend of white and light grey that flows into your home to create a unique homely visual. By combining bespoke craft with a nat
products.productdescription: The origin deluxe range has been expanded to included solitaire: a natural and gentle blend of white and light grey that flows into your home to create a unique homely visual. By combining bespoke craft with a natural tone, every slat brings an air of relaxation that will instantly make you and your guests feel at home.

products.title: Origin Deluxe, Cosmopolitan Grey - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Origin deluxe, cosmopolitan grey - venetian blind cosmopolitan grey is one of the most popular choices from their origin deluxe range, and with good reason. With a unique tone that allows you to create a homely and relaxing atmosphere in any room, it brings
products.productdescription: Cosmopolitan grey is one of the most popular choices from their origin deluxe range, and with good reason. With a unique tone that allows you to create a homely and relaxing atmosphere in any room, it brings with it a sense of balance and poise that will allow you to add new depth and character to your decor in an instant.

products.title: Origin Deluxe, African Blackwood - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Origin deluxe, african blackwood - venetian blind the ultimate in luxury, the origin deluxe african blackwood offers all of the style and functionality of the standard range, yet with a cool, designer look, with its thick louvres and sleek, jet black fini
products.productdescription: The ultimate in luxury, the origin deluxe african blackwood offers all of the style and functionality of the standard range, yet with a cool, designer look, with its thick louvres and sleek, jet black finish. And, as well as a matching pelmet and rail, it comes with coordinated, high quality ladder tapes.There is no colour combination more glamorous than that of black and gold, so embrace the luxe and pair the two tones together in a contemporary dining room. Opt for ivory walls, then furnish the room with a modern, black dining set, and gold embellishments throughout the room.

products.title: Origin Deluxe, Bright White - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Origin deluxe, bright white - venetian blind the pure snow white of the origin deluxe in bright white has a matt appearance that is at odds with its smooth and streamlined feel. Teamed with matching, high quality components, including designer-style ladde
products.productdescription: The pure snow white of the origin deluxe in bright white has a matt appearance that is at odds with its smooth and streamlined feel. Teamed with matching, high quality components, including designer-style ladder tapes, this blind is a real style statement.Pit the bright white against a bold, focal feature wall, painted in a bright cobalt or dark navy. Alternatively, go for an attention-grabbing wallpaper to create the same effect. Craft a nautical look across the room with bleached wooden floorboards and rope and anchor accessories.

products.title: Kolsva Deluxe, Wengi - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Kolsva deluxe, wengi - venetian blind transfix your guests with the distinguishing and dynamic kolsva deluxe in wengi, where bold sophistication meets classic, craftsman excellence. This dramatic, twilight shaded blind with coordinating supports and decor
products.productdescription: Transfix your guests with the distinguishing and dynamic kolsva deluxe in wengi, where bold sophistication meets classic, craftsman excellence. This dramatic, twilight shaded blind with coordinating supports and decorative trimmings, generates a demanding window arrangement with modern components and valuable utility.Fashion a creative master bedroom with striking characteristics and vivid colour by suspending the wengi against a vibrant teal background. Include toning, ebony furnishings with an antiqued influence and dramatic flair amongst silky, azure bedlinens and black, crystal chandeliers.

products.title: Kolsva Deluxe, Sheesham - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Kolsva deluxe, sheesham - venetian blind for a homely and convivial dcor scheme containing authentic, basswood timber and extra designer detail, elect the kolsva deluxe sheesham for its wholesome, conker shade. Sourced from sustainable forests, these cra
products.productdescription: For a homely and convivial dcor scheme containing authentic, basswood timber and extra designer detail, elect the kolsva deluxe sheesham for its wholesome, conker shade. Sourced from sustainable forests, these craftsman-built, quality louvres, with matching supports and decorative ladders, produce a glamorous window dressing that is both conservational and convenient.Generate a luxury living space by corresponding the sheesham with similarly toned, deep furnishings, and walnut-hued flooring. Shape a delectable and comforting colour palette with cocoa-toned furnishings, creamy walls, and elegant golden touches, for both contrast and stylishness.

products.title: Kolsva Deluxe, Tawny Oak - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Kolsva deluxe, tawny oak - venetian blind for an authentic window dressing absolute in fashioning a striking, designer look, choose the kolsva deluxe in tawny oak for its craftsman quality louvres and elegant, coordinating ladders. The grouping of natural
products.productdescription: For an authentic window dressing absolute in fashioning a striking, designer look, choose the kolsva deluxe in tawny oak for its craftsman quality louvres and elegant, coordinating ladders. The grouping of naturally toned timber with matching pelmets and rails creates a compelling feature that allows flexibility to suit your shading and privacy preferences.As the tawny oak features a quality, anti-cracking and warping component, fashion a distinctive dcor scheme in your kitchen, with similarly shaded surfaces. Create a complementing colour palette of honeyed tones and soothing creams to form an elegant array of shading with genuine class.

products.title: Kolsva Deluxe, Pale Oak - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Kolsva deluxe, pale oak - venetian blind turning your chosen space into a celebration of function and form is all about adding something unexpected. With the deluxe version of the ever-popular pale oak offering from the kolsva range you'll be able to enjo
products.productdescription: Turning your chosen space into a celebration of function and form is all about adding something unexpected. With the deluxe version of the ever-popular pale oak offering from the kolsva range you'll be able to enjoy a calming natural colour that accentuates the free-flowing beauty of wood grain. There's nothing better than a lounge that allows you to switch off and put your feet up is there? With pale oak hanging with pride in your window you'll be able to create a theme with nothing more than a lightly coloured rug and matching ceramic table lamp.

products.title: Kolsva Deluxe, Sycamore - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Kolsva deluxe, sycamore - venetian blind uniting practicality with elegance, the kolsva deluxe sycamore hosts modern, adjustable louvres with quality, and coordinating, decorative ladders. This authentic window dressing displays a natural, sun-kissed timb
products.productdescription: Uniting practicality with elegance, the kolsva deluxe sycamore hosts modern, adjustable louvres with quality, and coordinating, decorative ladders. This authentic window dressing displays a natural, sun-kissed timber with comparable supports for traditional and tasteful style.Fashion a sophisticated and restful dcor in the boudoir, by embracing the sycamore with similarly toned furnishings and lushly textured wallpaper. Structure a tasteful colour scheme with honeyed tones and soothing ivory, including sumptuous, creamy bedlinen and subtle golden hues for added comfort and glamour.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Pearl River - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Kalmar deluxe, pearl river - venetian blind the pearl river, from the plush kalmar deluxe collection, is pretty, chic, and at the height of fashion. Its vintage look is created by the light layer of blue-grey paint, through which the attractive grain of t
products.productdescription: The pearl river, from the plush kalmar deluxe collection, is pretty, chic, and at the height of fashion. Its vintage look is created by the light layer of blue-grey paint, through which the attractive grain of the basswood is clearly visible. Matching parts, including linen ladder ribbons, complete the look.Hang the pearl river in your master bedroom amidst a french-inspired decor scheme. Craft a subtle colour palette of pale greys and soft creams, adding the occasional hint of vintage pink for some characterful hue.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Jacobean Oak - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Kalmar deluxe, jacobean oak - venetian blind dark and atmospheric, the kalmar deluxe's jacobean oak offers true traditional style. Backed with coordinating linen ladder tapes and fashioned with a matching pelmet and bottom rail, the look is clean and coor
products.productdescription: Dark and atmospheric, the kalmar deluxe's jacobean oak offers true traditional style. Backed with coordinating linen ladder tapes and fashioned with a matching pelmet and bottom rail, the look is clean and coordinated, so that nothing can detract from this designer aesthetic.Craft a polished country look in the living room by matching the jacobean oak with a burnt orange shade on a feature wall. Paint the remainder of the walls in a homely cream and accent the room with pops of pale sage or apple green. Your room will feel gorgeously cosy, perfect for curling up on the sofa!

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Spanish Cedar - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Kalmar deluxe, spanish cedar - venetian blind light and unassuming, the spanish cedar combines all of the simplicity of wood with the plush luxury of the kalmar deluxe range, which incorporates high quality wood, sturdy components, and coordinating detail
products.productdescription: Light and unassuming, the spanish cedar combines all of the simplicity of wood with the plush luxury of the kalmar deluxe range, which incorporates high quality wood, sturdy components, and coordinating detailing - everything from hand-painted slat ends to woven linen taping.Transform a dull hallway into an airy and spacious welcoming by melding the spanish cedar with cream or white walls and opting for country-style woods throughout. Add shabby chic accessories, such as painted wicker hearts and rustic trinkets, to finish the look.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Ridgeback - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Kalmar deluxe, ridgeback - venetian blind when you opt for the deluxe version of kalmar ridgeback you're promising your home a touch of the unexpected. By adding a rich tapestry of shade and colour to the mix you can create multiple jumping off points for
products.productdescription: When you opt for the deluxe version of kalmar ridgeback you're promising your home a touch of the unexpected. By adding a rich tapestry of shade and colour to the mix you can create multiple jumping off points for a new layer of colour that flows gently around any room. We love the idea of use kalmar ridgeback in the conservatory where the increased window space compared to other rooms will allow ridgeback to really set the tone. Add in some dark brown wicker furniture and you're all set!

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Slate - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Kalmar deluxe, slate - venetian blind kalmar slate deluxe is the perfect way to allow your home to really make a statement. With a rich variety of greys that allow you to see something different every time you look at them you'll be able to coordinate wit
products.productdescription: Kalmar slate deluxe is the perfect way to allow your home to really make a statement. With a rich variety of greys that allow you to see something different every time you look at them you'll be able to coordinate with your favourite shades as you reinvent any room in the house. Think about the contrasts you can create with light walls and floors and darker eye-catching accessories like scatter cushions and a lampshade. That way you can reinterpret your decor without overpowering what you already have.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Iron Mountain - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Kalmar deluxe, iron mountain - venetian blind turning your home into the one place in the world you never want to leave is all about getting your interiors working in perfect harmony. With iron mountain (deluxe) from the kalmar range you'll be able to wel
products.productdescription: Turning your home into the one place in the world you never want to leave is all about getting your interiors working in perfect harmony. With iron mountain (deluxe) from the kalmar range you'll be able to welcome a contemporary colour through your door and see how it works in perfect harmony with the natural grain of the materials. We love the idea of using iron mountain in the bathroom to help break up the sea of light colours and crisp whites. Ideal if you want to introduce contrast without overpowering the existing colour scheme.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Cool Grey - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Kalmar deluxe, cool grey - venetian blind with kalmar cool grey (deluxe) you'll be able to create a homely interior that is on-trend and right up to date with the latest colour trends. The off-white detailing of the grain is a great way to lighten the moo
products.productdescription: With kalmar cool grey (deluxe) you'll be able to create a homely interior that is on-trend and right up to date with the latest colour trends. The off-white detailing of the grain is a great way to lighten the mood and take the edge off the dominant background colour. Turning the guest bedroom into the homely space that your friends and family will never want to leave is all about finding the right balance. With a matching rug contrasted against a light beige carpet and cream walls you'll be able to get things just how you want them.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Windrift - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Kalmar deluxe, windrift - venetian blind windrift is the latest addition to the kalmar range, and one that comes highly recommended for those of you looking to reinvent your decor. The gentle beige background serves as the perfect canvas for the whitened
products.productdescription: Windrift is the latest addition to the kalmar range, and one that comes highly recommended for those of you looking to reinvent your decor. The gentle beige background serves as the perfect canvas for the whitened grain that shines through in all weathers. Turn the hard to decorate upstairs landing into one of the most pleasingly decorated spaces in your home with a light beige lampshade and matching piece of wall art. What you choose is up to you, but with windrift hanging in your window you'll be able to strike the right balance between colour and shade.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Barkley - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Kalmar deluxe, barkley - venetian blind as your eye traces its way across kalmar barkley you'll see the natural way in which the stone greys and off-whites flow into one another. This is a design free of the rigid constraints of geometric patterns. Instea
products.productdescription: As your eye traces its way across kalmar barkley you'll see the natural way in which the stone greys and off-whites flow into one another. This is a design free of the rigid constraints of geometric patterns. Instead it finds its inspiration in the gently flowing patterns of wood grains. Turn the landing into the stylish transient space that you've always wanted with a little help from barkley. With a stone grey jug on a narrow side table and a rug along the landing you'll be able to bring everything together in perfect harmony.

products.title: Kaleidoscope Deluxe, Clementine High Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Kaleidoscope deluxe, clementine high gloss - venetian blind clementine brings a summery touch of energy to your decor that is guaranteed to put a smile on your face. The sleek gloss finishing shimmers in the light and the deluxe touch of the fabric ribbon
products.productdescription: Clementine brings a summery touch of energy to your decor that is guaranteed to put a smile on your face. The sleek gloss finishing shimmers in the light and the deluxe touch of the fabric ribbons adds a subtle layer of depth to this uniquely modern finish.Work some yellows into your decor and use clementine in the kitchen so that you can use the glow and radiance of the gloss finishing to spread some cheer and joy into the heart of the home. Perfect for creating an ambience that invites you in to spend time with the people you love.

products.title: Kaleidoscope Deluxe, Plum High Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Kaleidoscope deluxe, plum high gloss - venetian blind plum is a rich and deep shade that helps add a relaxing and restful air to your home the instant you enter. With a high gloss finish that shimmers in the light you will be adding a touch of luxury that
products.productdescription: Plum is a rich and deep shade that helps add a relaxing and restful air to your home the instant you enter. With a high gloss finish that shimmers in the light you will be adding a touch of luxury that is perfectly accented by the ladder ribbons that bring this one of a kind design to life. We love using plum in the bedroom where the depth of the purple will allow you to switch off the moment your head hits the pillow. Add a matching table lamp and a selection of scatter cushions for the perfect relaxing space away from it all.

products.title: Kaleidoscope Deluxe, Carmen High Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Kaleidoscope deluxe, carmen high gloss - venetian blind the uplifting and luxurious touch of carmen works in perfect harmony with the gentle addition of the fabric ladder ribbons that add something a little special to your decor. The finish is sleek and t
products.productdescription: The uplifting and luxurious touch of carmen works in perfect harmony with the gentle addition of the fabric ladder ribbons that add something a little special to your decor. The finish is sleek and the epitome of high quality gloss; exactly the finishing touch you have been searching high and low for. Pair carmen with a soft red to create a beautiful synergy between opposite ends of the colour spectrum. No matter what you have in mind, celebrate the beauty that is inherent in the simple minimalist approach and you will not be disappointed.

products.title: Kaleidoscope Deluxe, Scarlet High Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Kaleidoscope deluxe, scarlet high gloss - venetian blind scarlet is an enticing shade of red that welcomes you in to put your feet up and rest easy. By combining a unique ribbon ladder with an immaculately polished surface that shimmers in the light we ha
products.productdescription: Scarlet is an enticing shade of red that welcomes you in to put your feet up and rest easy. By combining a unique ribbon ladder with an immaculately polished surface that shimmers in the light we have created something a little special that will add a deluxe touch to any room in the home. Turn the living room into the colourful and relaxing space you have always wanted it to be by pairing scarlet with some cobalt blue walls and wooden flooring. Perfect for the harmonious look and feel that make your house a home.

products.title: Kaleidoscope Deluxe, Lime High Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Kaleidoscope deluxe, lime high gloss - venetian blind lime is an uplifting and soothing natural shade that will add a sense of calm and balance to any room in the house. The high gloss finish shimmers beautifully in the light and the fabric additions allo
products.productdescription: Lime is an uplifting and soothing natural shade that will add a sense of calm and balance to any room in the house. The high gloss finish shimmers beautifully in the light and the fabric additions allow you to add a subtle layer of depth to your decor. Perfect for adding something a little different that will provide the finishing touch you have been looking for. Turn your kitchen into a vibrant and uplifting space with lime shimmering in your window space. A couple of painted storage tins on the countertops and a vase of greenery on the breakfast bar will be the perfect additional touches.

products.title: Kaleidoscope Deluxe, Magenta High Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Kaleidoscope deluxe, magenta high gloss - venetian blind magenta is a modern shade with a little touch of electricity that will make you feel at ease the moment it takes pride of place in your home. The sleek gloss finish and the delicately applied ribbon
products.productdescription: Magenta is a modern shade with a little touch of electricity that will make you feel at ease the moment it takes pride of place in your home. The sleek gloss finish and the delicately applied ribbon ladder will add a touch of luxury that puts a smile on your face. Use magenta in the living room and combine it with black leather and white fabric to create a modern look that you will love instantly. A leather sofa and a white rug in front of the fire should be right at the top of your wish list.
